member.name: T:MyCaffe.data.BinaryFile
member.summary: The BinaryFile class is used to manage binary files used by the MNIST dataset creator.

member.summary: The constructor.
member.param: Specifies the filename.

member.name: M:MyCaffe.data.BinaryFile.Dispose
member.summary: Release all resources.

member.name: P:MyCaffe.data.BinaryFile.Reader
member.summary: Returns the binary reader used.

member.name: M:MyCaffe.data.BinaryFile.ReadUInt32
member.summary: Reads in a UINT32 and performs an endian swap.
member.returns: The endian swapped UINT32 is returned.

member.name: M:MyCaffe.data.BinaryFile.ReadBytes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads bytes from the file.
member.param: Specifies the number of bytes to read.
member.returns: The bytes read are returned in an array.

member.name: T:MyCaffe.data.CiFar10DataLoader
member.summary: The CiFar10DataLoader is used to create the CIFAR-10 dataset and load it into the database managed by the MyCaffe Image Database.

member.name: E:MyCaffe.data.CiFar10DataLoader.OnProgress
member.summary: The OnProgress event fires during the creation process to show the progress.

member.name: E:MyCaffe.data.CiFar10DataLoader.OnError
member.summary: The OnError event fires when an error occurs.

member.name: E:MyCaffe.data.CiFar10DataLoader.OnCompleted
member.summary: The OnComplete event fires once the dataset creation has completed.

member.summary: The constructor.
member.param: Specifies the creation parameters.
Specifies the output log used to show status updates.
Specifies the cancel event used to abort the creation process.

member.name: M:MyCaffe.data.CiFar10DataLoader.LoadDatabase(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create the dataset and load it into the database.
member.param: Specifies the creator ID.
member.returns: On successful creation, true is returned, otherwise false is returned on abort.

member.summary: Contains the dataset parameters used to create the CIFAR-10 dataset.

member.summary: The ProgressInfo is used when reporting the overall progress of creating a dataset.

member.summary: The constructor.
member.param: Specifies the current index in the process.
Specifies the total items to process.
Specifies the message to display.
Specifies an error if one occurred, or null.
Specifies whether or not the process is alive.

member.summary: Returns the percentage of the current process.

member.summary: Returns the message as a string.

member.summary: Returns the error if one occurred, or null.

member.name: P:MyCaffe.data.ProgressInfo.Alive
member.summary: Returns whether or not the process is alive or not.
